The VAT is not icluded. The investment's amount includes  the investmentsfor the not compliant situations and also the needs for renovation and  maintainance of theperformance of the whole system.  It must be noted that the 2020 report for Article 17 includes all the necessary funding for the completion of pending infrastructure for the country to be fully compliant to Directive 91/271/EEC. It does not refer to potential future needs for the extension/ replacement/ upgrading of existing infrastructure which operates in compliance with the provisions of the Directive. Besides, all the information included in article 17 xls concerns non-compliant agglomerations or agglomerations under pending deadlines that do not meet the UWWTD requirements and also treatment plants which are considered non-compliant or plants under pending implementation deadlines that do not meet the UWWTD requirements.

soecCapicity: Betrifft derzeitige Ausbaugröße (Bemessungskapazität gemäß Genehmigungsbescheid) bezogen auf öffentliche Abwasserbehandlungsanlagen ab mindestens 50 EW (p.e.) Ausbaugröße; Datenquelle: Statistisches Bundesamt (Fachserie 19 Reihe 2.1.2) 2016; Erhebung alle 3 Jahre; soecInVCol und soecTp: wirtschaftliche Kennzahlen, darunter auch Investitionszahlen für den Bereich Abwasserentsorgung werden separat im Rahmen der Statistik des produzierenden Gewerbes (Fachserie 4 Reihe 6.1) jährlich seit 2008 vom Statistischen Bundesamt erhoben und publiziert. Die Berichte erscheinen frühestens 18 Monate nach Ablauf des Berichtzeitraumes. Vorher waren die Informationen unter """Energie- und Wasserversorgung""" subsumiert und daher nicht separat ausweisbar. Die Erhebungspflicht besteht für Unternehmen der Abwasserentsorgung, die eine jährliche Schmutzwassermenge von 200.000 m³ und mehr behandeln. Dies deckt sich in etwa mit dem Geltungsbereich der Kommunalabwasserrichtlinie. Ein wichtiges Ergebnis dieser Erhebung sind die getätigten Investitionen. Den größten Anteil bei den Investitionen haben die Investitionen in technische Anlagen und Maschinen. Diese werden in der Statistik separat ausgewiesen. Davon werden u.a. Investitionen in Leitungs- und Rohrnetz (Tabelle 2.6) separat ausgewiesen und hier als Investitionen in Kanalnetz angenommen. Die Angaben zu Investitionen in Anlagen ergeben sich aus der Differenz der Investitionen in technische Anlagen und Maschinen und in Kanalnetz(Tabelle 2.5). Zahlen zu geplanten Investitionen werden nicht erhoben und liegen daher nicht vor.

Unit: Million EUR. EURSEK FX-rate: 10.5

Estimated investment costs, VAT not included. Data collected through a national survey with approximately 76 % respondants on the questions concerning investment costs. Linear extrapolation within size-classes of WWTPs has been used to estimate costs for non-respondants. The organic design capacity is the value from the reporting of the UWWTD´s Article 15.

Unit: Million EUR. EURSEK FX-rate: 10.5
 
Estimated investment costs, VAT not included. Data collected through a national survey with approximately 76 % respondants on the questions concerning investment costs. Linear extrapolation within size-classes of WWTPs has been used to estimate costs for non-respondants. The organic design capacity is the value from the reporting of the UWWTD´s Article 15.

Unit: Million EUR. EURSEK FX-rate: 10.5.

Estimated investment costs, VAT not included. Data collected through a national survey with approximately 76 % respondants on the questions concerning investment costs. Linear extrapolation within size-classes of WWTPs has been used to estimate costs for non-respondants. The organic design capacity is the value from the reporting of the UWWTD´s Article 15.

Assumption of mean yearly inflation rate used for estimates of future costs: 3 %.

The expected WWTP capacity by the end of 2022 comprises the installed capacity of 6,302,280 p.e. on the 01/01/2020 plus an expected additional installed capacity of 106,872 p.e. by the end of 2022. Collecting Systems investment comprises capital maintenance of €74M and capital investment & national programmes of €421M. WWTPs investment comprises capital maintenance €153M and capital investment & national programmes of €611M. All investments are in million euro and include VAT.

The expected WWTP capacity by the end of 2027 comprises the expected installed capacity of 6,409,152 p.e. plus an expected additional installed capacity of 566,119 p.e. Collecting Systems investment comprises capital maintenance of €307M and capital investment & national programmes of €1,381M. WWTPs investment comprises capital maintenance €461M and capital investment & national programmes of €1,684M. All investments are in million euro and include VAT.*
*Figures for 2023-2027 are indicative, these will be further developed as Irish Water develops its next Investment Plan which will cover the period 2025 to 2029 (subject to Economic Regulator (Commission for Regulation of Utilities) confirmation. The indicative investment figures show an increase in projected investment in wastewater infrastructure from an average of c. €420m/annum in 2020-22 to an average of c. €770m/annum in 2023-27. The increase in projected investment in wastewater infrastructure in the 2023-27 period is also attributable to forecasted investment on a number of large scale projects including, Arklow WWTP, Ringsend WWTP, Athlone Main Drainage and the Greater Dublin Drainage project.

A soecCapacity e os soeINV correspondem às ETAR reportadas ao abrigo do art.º 17.º da DARU. A soecCapacity corresponde à carga que entra nas ETAR no ano horizonte de projeto. Reportaram-se três períodos em simultâneo P(2013-2019), CU (2020) e EXP (2020-2027) porque não se consegue obter a informação discriminada.
